dmca.title: [ADMINS] Stolen copy, images and design
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: Sales ValueMyHouse [mailto:sales@valuemyhouse.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, September 19, 2006 12:12 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [ADMINS] Stolen copy, images and design
Subject: RE: [ADMINS] Stolen copy, images and design


All of the images and text is copyrighted by Digital Vision since 2002
so since you have a complete disregard for this information and the fact
that I have tried to be civil and give you notice of the violation under
US copyright law,  I will forward this to our legal consul to proceed
against your company and the people you are hosting. 


Seamus McDonald
27919 Jefferson Ave
Suite 210
Temecula, CA 92590
951-491-7500 Direct
866-259-0958 Toll Free

-----Original Message-----
From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com]
Sent: Tuesday, September 19, 2006 10:02 AM
To: Sales ValueMyHouse
Subject: FW: [ADMINS] Stolen copy, images and design

 
> To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does

> 
>

> -----Original Message-----
> From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com [mailto:planetadmins- 
> bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Sales ValueMyHouse
> Sent: Monday, September 18, 2006 5:07 PM
> To: Admins
> Cc: Planet Support
> Subject: [ADMINS] Stolen copy, images and design
> 
> Dear Tristan:
> 
> We have come across  a  website hosted on your servers  (see below) , 
> using our copyrighted artwork and forms from valuemyhouse.com. Please 
> let your customer know this is our information and have them remove it

> immediately or we will be forced to take legal action against them and

> your company for hosting it, under the Digital Millennium Copyright 
> Act.
> 
> Please call me if you have any questions.
> 
> Seamus McDonald
> 27919 Jefferson Ave
> Suite 210
> Temecula, CA 92590
> 951-491-7500 Direct
> 866-259-0958 Toll Free
>
